categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures novels

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures 3: The Fury of Darth Maul

Episode I Adventures 3: The Fury of Darth Maul is a Star Wars Legends junior novel written by Ryder Windham. It is the third volume of the Star Wars: Episode I Adventures series, and it was published by Scholastic on November 1, 1999, with an accompanying gamebook. A sequel, Jedi Emergency, was published the following month.
Someone has stolen something that belongs to Darth Sidious.
And when a Sith Lord wants something, there's only one person he can trust to get it –
